main.description:
Survive a series of disasters ranging from natural to artificial hazards!
• 6 player PvE experience.
• Encounter classic hazards such as Black Hole, or Rising Lava!
• Friendly competition with other players for the highest survival streaks!
• Earn achievements for completing certain actions.
...and more!

Mode Page: https://workshop.codes/survive-disasters
Learn with Workshop Creators at: https://workshop.codes/discord
★ Always import code GWZB4 to play on the latest version, do not save settings.
